author: cms-sw
body:
Updated to version 1.1.17 and cleanup the `VECGEOM_EXTERNAL_INCLUDES` relocation.
Remove `USOLIDS` flags see https://gitlab.cern.ch/VecGeom/VecGeom/-/commit/f54e04fb697cf5a7e260620ee2361713d7403282 and https://gitlab.cern.ch/VecGeom/VecGeom/-/commit/b08c5b98fde306974f6d9ea1b034a7b899f592ef
title: [VecGeom] Update to version v1.1.17
